ch0147_40_hugh/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re right on
time, as always!
ch0147_40_hugh/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s head to school together! Keep up so
we’re not late!
ch0147_40_hugh/7101_0701_01_10:
I always look forward to classes where I can
move around a lot!
ch0147_40_hugh/7101_0701_02_10:
My stamina is strong, so I can finish any
assignment that’s thrown at me!
ch0147_40_hugh/7105_0701_01_10:
Studying is like Pokémon battling—you don’t
have to do it all on your own.
ch0147_40_hugh/7105_0701_02_10:
If you ever need help, you can count on me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Rosa and Nate
are here for you, too!
ch0147_40_hugh/7105_0701_03_10:
Let’s all support each other and have a great
time at school!
ch0147_40_hugh/1701_0701_01_10:
Here! This is to cheer you on, since you’re
always working so hard at the academy!
ch0147_40_hugh/1701_0702_01_10: Hope you keep enjoying your time at school!
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m only asking just in case, but nobody’s
been bullying you, right?
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0701_02_10: If they have, tell me right away!
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0701_03_10: You’re not alone! I’ve got your back!
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0702_01_10:
So many people have gathered here.
It wouldn’t be odd to run into someone you
don’t like.
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0702_02_10: But that doesn’t make it OK to hurt them!
ch0147_40_hugh/2501_0702_03_10:
Dealing with people can be tricky,
but there’s always a solution!
ch0147_40_hugh/3001_0701_01_10:
C’mon—let’s head out and get stuff done!
We’re gonna train ALL day.
ch0147_40_hugh/3003_0701_01_10:
We’ve still got loads of time. C’mon, let’s go
do some more training!
ch0147_40_hugh/3005_0701_01_10:
We sure got a lot done today! Let’s give it
our all tomorrow, too.
